document_data.name: Slitherstill
document_data.mainbody: '''Slitherstill''' was a concoction which helped kill wakefulness.
document_data.Powers: Slitherstill was a fast-acting sleeping drug, oft-favored by insomniacs and kidnappers alike. Too much, however, could prove lethal.
document_data.Notable Makers: While by no means the only source, even locally, [[Maelaeve Belvrost]] was known to trade in it.
